kenmore.description: Partly cloudy. Winds northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light in the evening.
Mostly sunny. Light winds becoming north to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the middle of the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the late afternoon and evening. The chance of a thunderstorm in the west at night. Winds northerly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light in the late evening.
Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening.
Sunny. Light winds becoming west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day then becoming light during the afternoon.
Sunny. Light winds becoming north to northeasterly 20 to 30 km/h during the day.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning westerly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning.
Sunny. Light winds becoming east to southeasterly 20 to 30 km/h during the day.

ipswich.description: Partly cloudy. Winds northeasterly 20 to 25 km/h becoming light in the evening.
Mostly sunny. Light winds becoming northeasterly 20 to 25 km/h in the late afternoon then becoming light in the evening.

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers in the late afternoon and evening. The chance of a late thunderstorm. Light winds becoming northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the middle of the day.
Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening.
Sunny. Light winds becoming westerly 15 to 20 km/h during the day then becoming light during the afternoon.
Sunny. Light winds becoming northwest to northeasterly 20 to 25 km/h during the day.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming westerly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning.
Sunny. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
